text.name: moduleName
text.shortDescription: Bindings used in the communication address, subject and body will be based on the selected module document.

text.name: documentName
text.shortDescription: Bindings used in the communication address, subject and body will be based on the selected module document.

text.name: toBinding
text.shortDescription: Provide a binding which contains the email address to send to

text.name: sendTo
text.shortDescription: The address to send to. Bindings are allowed relative to the above module document.

text.name: subject
text.shortDescription: The subject of the communication. Bindings are allowed relative to the above module document.

markup.name: body
markup.shortDescription: The body of the communication. <p/> Bindings are allowed relative to the above module document. <p/> To include images in the HTML, switch to the Source view, and embed the 64bit encoding from a site like http://www.freeformatter.com/base64-encoder.html

text.name: filePath
text.shortDescription: The path (local to the server) where bulk files will be created.
